name: Meihli's Blessing
description:
THEME : RETELL A TALE

After Thor's beloved goats Tanngrisnir & Tanngnjóstr have been accidentally put 'out of commission' after a banquet gone awry, our hero is forced to go on a mythical adventure as he sets out to save Midgard from the World Serpent and the impending Ragnarok, whilst giving Thor Odinsson, the God of Thunder, a ride!

Our Game Jam project is a survival & exploration hybrid with ship repair and management mechanics, allowing the player to steer a ship and manage the sail as they drift across the wild sea. But, things become even more complicated as a Daugh army gets involved!

Can our hero complete this perilous journey and receive the Meihli's Blessing?
